entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Courtenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:28 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 08:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning then increasing to 40 this afternoon except gusting to 80 near the Strait of Georgia late this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h except gusting to 80 near the Strait of Georgia this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
